list_translation_mean.translate_mean: dao nhọn cột ở cựa gà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device with a small spike or a spiked wheel that is worn on a rider's heel and used for urging a horse forward.
a thing that prompts or encourages someone; an incentive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: profit was both the spur and the reward of enterprise
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lợi nhuận là cả sự thúc đẩy và phần thưởng của doanh nghiệp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a projection from a mountain or mountain range.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's an easy walk up the spur that leads to the summit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dễ dàng bước lên Spur dẫn đến hội nghị thượng đỉnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: urge (a horse) forward by digging one's spurs into its sides.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she spurred her horse towards the hedge
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy đã thúc đẩy con ngựa của mình về phía hàng rào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give an incentive or encouragement to (someone).
prune in (a side shoot of a plant) so as to form a spur close to the stem.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Spur trở lại các chồi bên
